Text: Does this contain only SNES Emulators and Homebrew? Might want to include more info before uploading a hack kit, otherwise nobody's gonna download it.
yeah, it's the snes9x emulator for wii and the homebrew channel. i have around 400 roms for it, but i didnt include them in the torrent, so it would be easier to download.
can i play back ups with this
if your wii is already a "hacked" version, then yes, you shouldnt have any problem using it.
